body_html: Maybe the model is underfitting or there's something wrong with the training procedure. We're using the GitHub issues only for bug reports and feature requests not for general help. If you have any questions, please ask them on our forums, but we can't help you debug any model you have. There are lots of things that can make training unstable, from data loading to exploding/vanishing gradients and numerical instability.

body: Maybe the model is underfitting or there's something wrong with the training procedure. We're using the GitHub issues only for bug reports and feature requests not for general help. If you have any questions, please ask them [on our forums](discuss.pytorch.org), but we can't help you debug any model you have. There are lots of things that can make training unstable, from data loading to exploding/vanishing gradients and numerical instability.
